entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
